title: Awarding the long term contracts to import diesel for a period of 8 months
decision_details:
-The proposal made by the Minister of Energy to award the following long term procurement to import diesel for a period of eight months from 2020‑10‑15 to 2021‑06‑14 as recommended by the Special Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet. 

*	To award the procurement of 1,365,000 Bbls of Gas Oil with maximum sulphur percentage of 0.05 and 315,000 Bbls of Gas Oil with maximum sulphur percentage of 0.001 to M/s Emirates National Oil Company, Singapore (ENOC).

*	To award the procurement of 1,120,000 Bbls of Gas Oil with maximum sulphur percentage of 0.05 to M/s Emirates National Oil Company, Singapore (ENOC).
